verses.roman:
bhojana dekhi' yadyapi tāṅra hṛdaye ullāsa
nṛsiṁha lakṣya kari' bāhye kichu kare duḥkhābhāsa

synonyms: bhojana dekhi'-seeing the eating; yadyapi—although; tāṅra hṛdaye—within his heart; ullāsa—jubilation; nṛsiṁha—Lord Nṛsiṁhadeva; lakṣya kari'-for the sake of; bāhye—externally; kichu—some; kare—does; duḥkha-ābhāsa—expression of disappointment.
translation: Although Nṛsiṁha Brahmacārī felt jubilation within his heart to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu eating everything, for the sake of Lord Nṛsiṁhadeva he externally expressed disappointment.
